mapper.select: select goodType.name as goodType, good.goodTypeId as goodtypeId, good.name as name, profile, price, good.goodId as goodId, stock, soldSum, onSale, detail, detailImgId as detailsImg FROM good,goodType WHERE good.goodTypeId=goodType.goodTypeId ORDER BY rand() limit #{maxSize}

select goodType.name as goodType, good.goodTypeId as goodtypeId, good.name as name, profile, price, good.goodId as goodId, stock, soldSum, onSale, detail, detailImgId as detailsImg FROM good,goodType WHERE good.goodId=#{goodId} AND good.goodTypeId=goodType.goodTypeId
select imgId from goodImg WHERE goodId=#{id}
